Package de.presti.ree6.game.impl.blackjack.entities

Klasse BlackJackPlayer

java.lang.Object
de.presti.ree6.game.core.base.GamePlayer
de.presti.ree6.game.impl.blackjack.entities.BlackJackPlayer
public class BlackJackPlayer extends GamePlayer
Class entity used to represent a player in the game of blackjack.

    • aceCheck

      private int aceCheck(int currentValue, boolean checkHidden)
      Checks whether the player has an ace and if so, whether the value of the hand is over 21. If so, the value of the ace will be set to 1.
      Parameter:
      currentValue - The value of the hand.
      checkHidden - Whether to check the value of hidden cards or not.
      Gibt zurück:
      The value of the hand.
